home.aboutContent: Having lived in Spain for over a decade, I’ve developed a deep passion for its culture, lifestyle, and especially its sports scene. As an avid padel player, I’ve seen firsthand how this dynamic sport has become one of the fastest-growing in the world. With years of experience organizing work placements and cultural experiences for groups, I understand what makes a trip to Spain truly special—whether it’s finding the best spots for padel, immersing in local culture, or creating memorable moments that blend sport and leisure. That’s why I started my padel experience company—to combine my expertise with my passion and offer unforgettable sports-focused experiences in Spain.

locationsComponent.barcelonaDescription: Barcelona is a city where sport and culture come together in a spectacular setting. Home to legendary teams, world-class facilities, and a deep passion for athletics, it’s the perfect destination for sports enthusiasts. Whether playing, training, or simply soaking in the atmosphere, this city is a dream for any sports traveller.
locationsComponent.sevillaDescription: Sevilla is a city celebrated for its rich sports culture, year-round sunshine, and lively atmosphere. Boasting top-tier training facilities and elite football clubs, it’s an ideal destination for sports groups. With its sun-drenched plazas, mouthwatering tapas, passionate flamenco, and endless charm, Andalusia truly embodies the spirit of Spain.

questions.advancedPlayer: Do I need to be an advanced player to join?
questions.comeAlone: Can I come alone, or do I need to come with a group?
questions.typicalDay: What’s a typical day like on a padel holiday?
questions.equipment: What equipment do I need to bring?
questions.flightsIncluded: Are flights included in the package?
questions.refund: Can I get a refund if I cancel?
questions.privateGroup: Can you help organise a private group holiday or corporate event?

answers.advancedPlayer: Not at all! We welcome players of all levels, from beginners to advanced. Our coaches will tailor sessions based on your ability and group you accordingly. Whether you’re just starting or looking to refine your technique, you’ll get something out of the experience.
answers.comeAlone: Our padel holidays are designed for private groups, but solo travellers are more than welcome too! If you’re coming on your own, we’ll personalise the experience just for you—organising coaching sessions, arranging partners for matches, and ensuring you have an incredible time both on and off the court.
answers.holidayBased: Our padel holidays are primarily based in Barcelona and Sevilla—two fantastic cities known for their vibrant culture, great food, and top-quality padel facilities. Looking for a different destination? We can also organise trips to other locations on request—just let us know what you have in mind!
answers.accommodation: We usually partner with comfortable hotels, villas, or resorts with easy access to the padel courts. All accommodations are selected for their quality, cleanliness, and location. Full details will be provided upon booking.
answers.typicalDay:
A typical day might include:

  • Morning padel coaching session
  • Free time to relax, explore and have lunch
  • Afternoon – cultural activity or additional padel session

There’s a balance between structured padel and downtime, so you can also enjoy the holiday vibe.
answers.equipment: Bring your padel racket, sportswear, and suitable shoes. If you don’t have a racket, let us know in advance—we can arrange one for you.
answers.flightsIncluded: No, flights are not included in the package. You’ll need to arrange your own travel to the destination. However, we can arrange private airport transfers to and from your accommodation to make your arrival and departure as smooth as possible. Just let us know your flight details in advance.
answers.whatToPack:
We recommend bringing:

  • Lightweight sportswear for padel and other sports activities.
  • Comfortable clothes for evenings
  • Sun protection (hat, sunglasses, sun cream)
  • Swimsuit (many locations have pools or beaches!)
  • Travel insurance documentation
answers.refund: Please see our Terms and Conditions for full details.
answers.travelInsurance: While not mandatory, we highly recommend travel insurance that covers padel and active holidays. It’s peace of mind in case of injury, delays, or cancellations.
answers.mealsIncluded: This varies by destination. Some packages include breakfast or group dinners, while others leave you free to explore the local food scene. Check your booking details for specifics.
answers.privateGroup: Absolutely! We love working with groups, clubs, and companies. Just contact us with your ideas and we’ll help tailor the perfect padel experience.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.intro: Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully before booking your holiday with VIBRA TRAVEL ('we', 'us', 'our'). By booking a trip, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

bookingAndPayment.title: Booking and Payment
content: A non-refundable deposit is required to secure your place.
The balance must be paid no later than 4 weeks before the start of your holiday. Failure to do so may result in cancellation of your booking.
Bookings made less than [X weeks] before the holiday start date must be paid in full at the time of booking.

whatsIncluded.title: What’s Included
content: Unless otherwise stated, our holiday packages typically include:
- Padel court time
- Coaching sessions, matches/tournament
- Local transfers (where applicable)
- Accommodation for the specified number of nights (as agreed in your package)
- Social events or excursions (if listed in your package)
Flights and travel insurance are **not included** unless explicitly stated.

cancellationsAndRefunds.title: Cancellations and Refunds
byYou: Cancellations must be made in writing.
If you cancel more than 4 weeks before the start date, we retain the deposit.
byUs: In the unlikely event we must cancel a trip (due to unforeseen circumstances), you will be offered a full refund or an alternative date.

travelAndInsurance.title: Travel and Insurance
content: You are responsible for booking your own travel to the destination.
Travel insurance is **strongly recommended**, including cover for padel and other physical activities.
We are not liable for costs incurred due to travel disruption, illness, or personal injury not directly caused by our negligence.

healthAndFitness.title: Health and Fitness
content: You must ensure you are physically fit to take part in padel sessions.
Any health conditions or injuries must be disclosed in advance. We reserve the right to decline participation based on medical concerns.

accommodationAndConduct.title: Accommodation and Conduct
content: You must treat the accommodation and facilities with respect. Any damage caused will be your responsibility.
We reserve the right to remove any participant who behaves in a way that negatively impacts the group or the local environment, without refund.

liability.title: Liability
content: We accept no responsibility for loss or damage to personal belongings during the holiday.
Our liability is limited to the cost of your holiday booking, except in cases of personal injury or death caused by our negligence.

changesToItinerary.title: Changes to Itinerary
content: We reserve the right to make reasonable changes to the itinerary due to weather, availability, or operational needs. We’ll always do our best to provide a similar alternative.

photosAndMarketing.title: Photos and Marketing
content: By attending one of our holidays, you agree that photos or videos taken during the trip may be used for marketing purposes. Please notify us in advance if you do not wish to appear in any promotional material.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
content: These Terms and Conditions are governed by the laws of Spain and any disputes will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of its courts.
